entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 08:56 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 08:56 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
